mapper.select: SELECT CI_NUM, CI_CONTENT, date_format(CI_CREDAT, '%Y. %m. %d') CI_CREDAT, date_format(CI_CRETIM, '%H시 %i분') CI_CRETIM, UI_NUM, BI_NUM FROM COMMENT_INFO WHERE CI_NUM = #{ciNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT_INFO (CI_CONTENT, CI_CREDAT, CI_CRETIM, UI_NUM, BI_NUM) VALUES (#{ciContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{uiNum}, #{biNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT_INFO SET CI_CONTENT = #{ciContent} WHERE CI_NUM = #{ciNum}
